content:
# Requirements: Test Dashboard Demo

> **Status:** Draft
> **Author:** Claude
> **Created:** 2026-01-24

## Overview

A simple demo feature to test the spec-workflow dashboard functionality.

## User Stories

### US-1: View Dashboard
**As a** developer
**I want to** see the spec workflow dashboard
**So that** I can track and approve specifications

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Dashboard loads at http://localhost:5000
- [ ] Can see list of specs
- [ ] Can view spec details
- [ ] Can approve or request changes

### US-2: Approve Spec
**As a** developer
**I want to** approve a specification
**So that** implementation can proceed

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Click "Approve" button on a spec
- [ ] Status changes to "Approved"
- [ ] Can proceed to next phase

## Technical Requirements

| Requirement | Description |
|-------------|-------------|
| TR-1 | Dashboard must be accessible via browser |
| TR-2 | Real-time status updates |
| TR-3 | Persistent storage of approvals |

## Out of Scope

- Authentication (single user for demo)
- Multi-project support
- Email notifications

## Success Criteria

- [ ] Dashboard displays this spec
- [ ] User can approve this spec
- [ ] Status updates reflect in real-time
